title: My brother's birthday
creator_credit: Max Hammond, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: In Syria, on the way to Beirut, Max Hammond’s thoughts turned to his family. One of seven children, Hammond and his three brothers served together in World War II. He recounts a close call that occurred on his brother’s birthday and reflects on how lucky he and his brothers are.
creator_credit_for_label: Max Hammond, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
